roleset.name: relieve of guilt

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Ultimately, [that carefully picked jury]-1 deadlocked with a 10-2 vote *trace* *trace*-1 to acquit, and the prosecution decided not to retry the case.

example.name: passive transitive
example.text: Although Mr. Hastings had been acquitted *trace* by a jury, lawmakers handling the prosecution in Congress had argued that the purpose of impeachment isn't to punish an individual.

example.name: all args
example.text: Mr. Hastings's case was particularly nettlesome because it marked the first time a federal official was impeached and removed from office on charges [of which]-1 a jury had acquitted him *trace*.

roleset.note: Based on WSJ, automatic expansion via verbnet. VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls free-80-1.
